description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"79vkf","text":"This protocol outlines the procedure for manual DNA extraction of microbiome DNA from rectal mucosa biopsy tissue and matched faecal samples taken during surgery and frozen at -80oC. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":179,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d1nc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bd06","text":"The protocol covers
1. DNA extraction from faecal samples using MP Biomedicals FastDNA Spin Kit and FastPrep-24 for bead-beating","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8okqv","text":"2. DNA extraction from rectal mucosa biopsy tissue using a modification of MP Biomedicals FastDNA Spin Kit and FastPrep-24 for bead-beating

Other steps not covered in this protocol are","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ii56","text":"3. Microbial DNA enrichment of extracted samples using NEB NEBNext Microbiome DNA Enrichment kit ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8136v","text":"4. DNA Quantitation of extracted DNA using the Qubit Flourometer 
5. Library Preparation for microbiome WGS using NEB NEBNext Ultra II FS DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ir7j","text":"6. DNA sequencing on the Illumina NextSeq2000","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
